text: Hi <@U0275RK0R1P> this channel is intended for releases and update notifications about HubSpot. I'm going to remove this post (as it's been posted in <#CSFGKSHT7|themes> already)  but just wanted to comment here to provide clarity on the intended use of this channel.

*Thinking about building a custom object?* 
How you store that data, and how it gets used in the business is incredibly important. You can save yourself time and frustration, and the business money by being strategic up front. Letâ€™s think like an architect.
